name: Nehrim: At Fate's Edge
summary: Nehrim: At Fate's Edge is a total conversion mod for TES IV: Oblivion. Explore the namegiving land of Nehrim with dense forests and deserts, delve into old crypts and caves, and experience an unusual, multi-layered storyline that takes place beyond known patterns of good and evil.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 开发: SureAI
  • 发行: SureAI
  • 游戏类型: RPG
  • 游戏引擎: Gamebryo
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 发行日期: 2020-06-12 (Steam)
  • 售价: Free
  • 官方网站: https://sureai.net/games/nehrim/
